Article.ArticleTitle: Synthesis of Unsymmetrical 2,6-Diarylanilines by Palladium-Catalyzed C-H Bond Functionalization Methodology.

AbstractText: 3,5-Dimethylpyrazole was employed as a monodentate directing group for palladium-catalyzed ortho-sp<sup>2</sup> C-H arylation with aryl iodides. The reaction shows good functional group tolerance and outstanding selectivity for mono- ortho-arylation. Ozonolysis of ortho-arylated arylpyrazoles gave acylated biphenylamines that were further arylated to afford unsymmetrically substituted 2,6-diarylacetanilides.
